attributes.action: Do not enforce mandatory quarantines for international arrivals.
attributes.additional_details:
Implement safety through test, mask or social distance. Keep doing the PCR on second day.  Safe travel does not require stripping people of their basic human rights.

The mental health of thousands is at risk if this is enforced. Some of us don’t see their families, some of us are being key workers at UK without any recognition.
attributes.background: Stop the push of mandatory quarantines for international travellers. This would make reuniting families and binational couples more difficult.
